headline.mapping: Map playlist channels to EPG channels

confirm.restore: All data will be replaced with those from the backup. Should the files be restored?

startingnumber.title: Filter Starting Number
startingnumber.description: Starting Channel Number to use for this Group Filter (Default is 1000)

category.title: Filter Category
category.description: Filter Category sets all channels in the filter to a specific category (news, sports, etc)

filterGroup.title: Group Title
filterGroup.description:
Select a M3U group. (Counter)
Changing the group title in the M3U invalidates the filter.

include.title: Include
include.description:
Channel name must include.
(Comma separated) Comma means or

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description:
Channel name must not contain.
(Comma separated) Comma means or

fileM3U.title: M3U File
fileM3U.placeholder: File path or URL of the M3U

tuner.title: Tuner / Streams
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Only available with activated buffer.
New settings will only be applied after quitting all streams.

http_proxy_ip.title: HTTP Proxy IP
http_proxy_ip.description: IP address to be used by HTTP Proxy

http_proxy_port.title: HTTP Proxy Port
http_proxy_port.description: Port to be used by HTTP Proxy

fileXMLTV.title: XMLTV File
fileXMLTV.placeholder: File path or URL of the XMLTV

http_proxy_ip.title: HTTP Proxy IP
http_proxy_ip.description: IP address to be used by HTTP Proxy

http_proxy_port.title: HTTP Proxy Port
http_proxy_port.description: Port to be used by HTTP Proxy

description.title: Channel Description
description.placeholder: Used by the Dummy as an XML description

ppvextra.title: PPV Extra Title
ppvextra.description: This will add custom text to the Programme data

uploadCustomImage.title: Custom Image
uploadCustomImage.description: Here you can upload an image that will be shown to users when no more tuners are available in the playlist!

update.title: Schedule for updating (Playlist, XMLTV, Backup)
update.description: Time in 24 hour format (0800 = 8:00 am). More times can be entered comma separated. Leave this field empty if no updates are to be carried out.

api.title: API Interface
api.description: Via API interface it is possible to send commands to Threadfin. API documentation is here

ssdp.title: SSDP
ssdp.description: SSDP is a network protocol for service discovery. It is used for the automatic detection of Threadfin in the network.

dummy.title: Enable Default Dummy Data
dummy.description: When enabled, this will automatically map inactive channels to the dummy data channel below. Use this to keep Live Event channels active.

dummyChannel.title: Dummy Data Channel
dummyChannel.description: Select the default channel to use when mapping inactive channels to the dummy data.

ignoreFilters.title: Ignore Filters
ignoreFilters.description: If checked, filtering is completely ignored.

epgSource.title: EPG Source
epgSource.description:
PMS:
- Use EPG data from Plex, Emby or Jellyfin

XEPG:
- Use of one or more XMLTV files
- Channel management
- M3U / XMLTV export (HTTP link for IPTV apps)

tuner.title: Number of Tuners
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Available for: Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, M3U (with active buffer).
After a change, Threadfin must be delete in the Plex / Emby / Jellyfin DVR settings and set up again.

filesUpdate.title: Updates all files at startup
filesUpdate.description: Updates all playlists, tuner and XMLTV files at startup.

cacheImages.title: Image Caching
cacheImages.description:
This option will rewrite the m3u file to local image cache for tv logos.
All images from the XMLTV file are cached, allowing faster rendering of the grid in the client.
Downloading the images may take a while and will be done in the background.

replaceEmptyImages.title: Replace missing program images
replaceEmptyImages.description: If the poster in the XMLTV program is missing, the channel logo will be used.

replaceChannelTitle.title: Replace PPV channels title/desc
replaceChannelTitle.description: Use this if your provider maps the PPV event name to the channel name

ThreadfinAutoUpdate.title: Automatic update of Threadfin
ThreadfinAutoUpdate.description: If a new version of Threadfin is available, it will be automatically installed. The updates are downloaded from GitHub.

streamBuffering.title: Stream Buffer
streamBuffering.description:
Functions of the buffer:
- The stream is passed from FFmpeg, VLC or Threadfin to Plex, Emby, Jellyfin or M3U Player
- Small jerking of the streams can be compensated
- HLS / M3U8 support
- RTP / RTPS support
- Re-streaming
- Separate tuner limit for each playlist
streamBuffering.info_false: No Buffer (Client connects directly to the streaming server)
streamBuffering.info_ffmpeg: FFmpeg connects to the streaming server
streamBuffering.info_vlc: VLC connects to the streaming server
streamBuffering.info_threadfin: Threadfin connects to the streaming server

udpxy.title: UDPxy address
udpxy.description: The address of your UDPxy server. If set, and the channel URLs in the m3u is multicast, Threadfin will rewrite it so that it is accessed via the UDPxy service.

ffmpegOptions.title: FFmpeg Options
ffmpegOptions.description:
FFmpeg options.
Only change if you know what you are doing.
Leave blank to set default settings.
ffmpegOptions.placeholder: Leave blank to set default settings

vlcOptions.title: VLC / CVLC Options
vlcOptions.description:
VLC / CVLC options.
Only change if you know what you are doing.
Leave blank to set default settings.
vlcOptions.placeholder: Leave blank to set default settings

bufferSize.title: Buffer Size
bufferSize.description:
Buffer size in MB.
M3U8: If the TS segment smaller then the buffer size, the file size of the segment is used.

bufferTerminationTimeout.title: Buffer Termination Timeout
bufferTerminationTimeout.description: Time in seconds that the buffer stays alive after the last client left

storeBufferInRAM.title: Store buffer in RAM
storeBufferInRAM.description: If checked, write buffer to RAM instead of writing to disk

autoReconnect.title: Automatic reconnect to stream
autoReconnect.description: If checked, the buffer will automatically reconnect to stream

omitPorts.title: Omit port
omitPorts.description: By activating this checkbox the m3u file will not contain the port in the url

bindingIPs.title: Binding IP(s)
bindingIPs.description:
By clicking on the input a dialogue will open where you can select the IP(s)
Please note that these are also the DVR IPs
Changing this option and saving the settings will exit the program!
You need to restart it if you did not configured an automatical restart!

forceHttps.title: Force HTTPS to Upstream server
forceHttps.description:
When this checkbox is activated Threadfin will be forced to use HTTPS connection to upstream server
This is not recommended as the given urls will be rewritten to https urls, this can lead to 404 HTTP Error Codes

useHttps.title: Use HTTPS
useHttps.description:
Enable HTTPS protocol for Threadfin, HTTPS Port needs to be set, otherwise the 443 will be used!
Also make sure that server.crt and server.key are placed in the config folder!
The key file needs to be unencrypted!

forceClientHttps.title: Force client to use https
forceClientHttps.description: All URLs to this threadfin instance will be starting with https

threadfinDomain.title: Threadfin Domain
threadfinDomain.description:
When not empty, this will rewrite the URLs in the new m3u to a FQDN.
It will also rewrite the shown DVR IP in the server info dialogue.
Do NOT include http (ex: somedomain.com)

enableNonAscii.title: Enable Non-ASCII
enableNonAscii.description: If checked, will allow special non ascii characters in the M3U and EPG. Default is disabled

epgCategories.title: EPG Categories
epgCategories.description: Customize the EPG Categories. The format is key:value|key:value, so News:news|Sports:sports|Movies:movies

epgCategoriesColors.title: EPG Categories Colors
epgCategoriesColors.description: Customize the EPG Category colors. The format is value:color|value:color, so news:tomato|sports:yellowgreen|movies:royalblue

bufferTimeout.title: Timeout for new client connections
bufferTimeout.description: The Threadfin buffer waits until new client connections are established. Helpful for fast channel switching. Value in milliseconds.

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: User Agent for HTTP requests. For every HTTP connection, this value is used for the user agent. Should only be changed if Threadfin is blocked.

backupPath.title: Location for automatic backups
backupPath.description: Before any update of the provider data by the schedule, Threadfin creates a backup. The path for the automatic backups can be changed. Threadfin requires write permission for this folder.

backupKeep.title: Number of backups to keep
backupKeep.description: Number of backups to keep. Older backups are automatically deleted.

authenticationWEB.title: WEB Authentication
authenticationWEB.description: Access to the web interface only possible with credentials.

authenticationPMS.title: PMS Authentication
authenticationPMS.description:
Plex requests are only possible with authentication.
Warning!!! After activating this function Threadfin must be delete in the PMS DVR settings and set up again.

authenticationM3U.title: M3U Authentication
authenticationM3U.description: Downloading the threadfin.m3u file via an HTTP request is only possible with authentication.

authenticationXML.title: XML Authentication
authenticationXML.description: Downloading the threadfin.xml file via an HTTP request is only possible with authentication

authenticationAPI.title: API Authentication
authenticationAPI.description: Access to the API interface is only possible with authentication.

language.title: Web client language
language.description: Change the language for the web client

epgSource.title: EPG Source
epgSource.description:
PMS:
- Use EPG data from Plex, Emby or Jellyfin

XEPG:
- Use of one or more XMLTV files
- Channel management
- M3U / XMLTV export (HTTP link for IPTV apps)

tuner.title: Number of tuners
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Available for: Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, M3U (with active buffer).
After a change, Threadfin must be delete in the Plex / Emby / Jellyfin DVR settings and set up again.

m3u.title: M3U Playlist
m3u.placeholder: File path or URL of the M3U

xmltv.title: XMLTV File
xmltv.placeholder: File path or URL of the XMLTV

update.title: Update available
update.content: A newer version of Threadfin is available. Please update to the latest version.
